text: Can we use bootstrap in HubSpot themes? Because I'm  finding difficulty in creating layouts.

I think yes.

Just include the CDN or @import in css.
Hopefully it will work

Yes you can use bootstrap. That said, you will need to create alias css classes for the grid classes used by the drag and drop areas.

Or leave the boilerplates simple grid in for handling the drag and drop areas, and just use the bootstrap classes for modules and templating.
